feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing brief summaries of frontend source files and assets.
frontend/.github/workflows/production-pu: GitHub Actions workflow that validates the production slug and checks related deployment files on pushes and PRs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing production slug rules, validation steps, and pre-deployment requirements.
frontend/domain-slug.json: JSON config defining the productionSlug value galfashionworld-2014.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and theme configurations for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry for the React app with favicon, metadata, and root mount point.
frontend/scripts/validate-production-slu: Node script that checks domain-slug.json for a matching productionSlug and reports validation errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing Header, Hero, BagGallery, About, Features, Contact, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section showing company overview text and two handbag gallery images within a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx: Displays a gallery of bag images and a materials section using mapped arrays and styled grid layouts.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Renders the contact section with company contact details and an embedded ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a validated contact form with state management, submission simulation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Lists key business features using a grid of styled cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides footer branding, quick links, services, and contact info with smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with headline text, call-to-action buttons, and a main promotional image.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Provides a styled section wrapper with configurable id and classes for page layout spacing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode values, and enforces global Times New Roman italic typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, visual theme decisions, and deployment notes for the site.
